CustomProperties.Name: AllowEditing
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether or not to show the "Edit" button and allow editing.

CustomProperties.Name: EditButtonAccessibleLabel
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Accessible label for the Edit button

CustomProperties.Name: EditButtonDisabled
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether or not the Edit button is disabled.

CustomProperties.Name: AutoHeightValue
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Set the component's height to this value to get auto height with word wrap.

CustomProperties.Name: OnSelectEdit
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Behavior to invoke when the Edit button is selected
